thread.title: Beauts to take on Boston at home
thread.title_full: Beauts to take on Boston at home - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Beauts to take on Boston at home
text:
Still looking for their first National Womenâ€™s Hockey League victory, the Buffalo Beauts (0-2-1) will face the Boston Pride for the second time this season, at 3:30 p.m. Sunday in HarborCenter.
Boston defeated the Beauts, 4-1, at HarborCenter two weeks ago in the season opener. Buffalo fell to the Connecticut Whale last Sunday, 2-1. Meghan Duggan and Kelley Stedman have accounted for the Buffalo goals so far. Four different players have two goals each for Boston (2-0-0). The Pride defeated the New York Riveters in their second game last Sunday.
